page.title: 12CHILDREN OF GLENLUCE
page.content: Glenluce has an active{pre-school {playgroup}for under fives.The primary school with 106 pupils aged from 5 to 12,was built in 1965.It is a{five {teacher school,}the classes being composite primary 1/2, 2/3, 4/5 with separate primary 6 and 7. A bright and airy school, it has a hall with lots of gym apparatus and a stage which can be used for concerts.There is a dining room which can seat 64 children. Outside there is a large grassy area used for football and sports as well as play, and also a tarred playground used for netball. There is a separate play area for primary 1-3. Glenluce also has a well attended{Sunday School with classes for the 3 to 12 year olds and a{Bible Class}for older children prior to their joining the church. Clubs open to children include Guides, Brownies, Cubs and Badminton.
